channel.title: Bootstrap, by twitter!
channel.description:
I posted this on mscp, so I may as well post it for mitb too.
Bootstrap is an open source HTML resource that can make a very nice sleek and flexible site. If you have any knowledge of PHP it looks brilliant if you link it to the forums of the server or whatever.
You can find bootstrap here - http://twitter.github.com/bootstrap/
If you don't know how to get the template you want you should be shot.
Not exactly a release, but it's a good find.
